mapper.select: SELECT A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."tsuchishoNo", A."rirekiNo", A."hihokenshaNo", B."choshuHouhou", B."ki", B."choteiId", C."choteigaku" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2003Kibetsu" AS B ON A."choteiNendo" = B."choteiNendo" AND A."fukaNendo" = B."fukaNendo" AND A."tsuchishoNo" = B."tsuchishoNo" AND A."rirekiNo" = B."rirekiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" AS C ON B."choteiId" = C."choteiId" INNER JOIN( SELECT T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."tsuchishoNo", MAX(T."rirekiNo") AS "rirekiNo" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS T WHERE T."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND T."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} AND #{chushutsuStYMD} <= T."choteiNichiji" AND T."choteiNichiji" < #{chushutsuEdYMD} GROUP BY T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."tsuchishoNo" ) AS FukaT ON FukaT."choteiNendo" = A."choteiNendo" AND FukaT."fukaNendo" = A."fukaNendo" AND FukaT."tsuchishoNo" = A."tsuchishoNo" AND FukaT."rirekiNo" = A."rirekiNo" WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} AND #{chushutsuStYMD} <= A."choteiNichiji" AND A."choteiNichiji" < #{chushutsuEdYMD}

SELECT A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."tsuchishoNo", A."rirekiNo", A."hihokenshaNo", (CASE WHEN A."hokenryoDankai2" is not null AND A."hokenryoDankai2" <> '' THEN A."hokenryoDankai2" ELSE A."hokenryoDankai1" END ) AS "dankai", B."choshuHouhou", B."choteiId", C."choteigaku" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2003Kibetsu" AS B ON A."choteiNendo" = B."choteiNendo" AND A."fukaNendo" = B."fukaNendo" AND A."tsuchishoNo" = B."tsuchishoNo" AND A."rirekiNo" = B."rirekiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" AS C ON B."choteiId" = C."choteiId" INNER JOIN( SELECT T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."tsuchishoNo", MAX(T."rirekiNo") AS "rirekiNo" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS T WHERE T."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND T."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} AND #{chushutsuStYMD} <= T."choteiNichiji" AND T."choteiNichiji" < #{chushutsuEdYMD} GROUP BY T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."tsuchishoNo" ) AS FukaT ON FukaT."choteiNendo" = A."choteiNendo" AND FukaT."fukaNendo" = A."fukaNendo" AND FukaT."tsuchishoNo" = A."tsuchishoNo" AND FukaT."rirekiNo" = A."rirekiNo" WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} AND #{chushutsuStYMD} <= A."choteiNichiji" AND A."choteiNichiji" < #{chushutsuEdYMD}

SELECT A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."tsuchishoNo", A."rirekiNo", A."hihokenshaNo", (CASE WHEN A."hokenryoDankai2" is not null AND A."hokenryoDankai2" <> '' THEN A."hokenryoDankai2" ELSE A."hokenryoDankai1" END ) AS "dankai", B."choshuHouhou", B."choteiId", C."choteigaku" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2003Kibetsu" AS B ON A."choteiNendo" = B."choteiNendo" AND A."fukaNendo" = B."fukaNendo" AND A."tsuchishoNo" = B."tsuchishoNo" AND A."rirekiNo" = B."rirekiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" AS C ON B."choteiId" = C."choteiId" INNER JOIN( SELECT T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."tsuchishoNo", MAX(T."rirekiNo") AS "rirekiNo" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS T WHERE T."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND T."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} AND T."choteiNichiji" <= #{chushutsuStYMD} GROUP BY T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."tsuchishoNo" ) AS FukaT ON FukaT."choteiNendo" = A."choteiNendo" AND FukaT."fukaNendo" = A."fukaNendo" AND FukaT."tsuchishoNo" = A."tsuchishoNo" AND FukaT."rirekiNo" = A."rirekiNo" WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} AND A."choteiNichiji" <= #{chushutsuStYMD}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A."hihokenshaNo") AS "dankaiKensu", A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."choshuHouhou", A."dogetsuFlag", A."dankai" FROM "TmpDankai" AS A WHERE A."dogetsuFlag" = #{dogetsuFlag} AND A."choshuHouhou" = #{choshuHouhou} AND A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} GROUP BY A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."choshuHouhou", A."dogetsuFlag", A."dankai"

SELECT COUNT(T."hihokenshaNo") AS "naiheisyaKensu", T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."choshuHouhou", T."dankai" FROM (SELECT A."hihokenshaNo", A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."dankai", A."choshuHouhou" FROM "TmpDankai" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} AND A."choshuHouhou" = '2' AND A."dogetsuFlag" = 1 )AS T GROUP BY T."choteiNendo", T."fukaNendo", T."choshuHouhou", T."dankai"

SELECT COUNT(Ta."hihokenshaNo") AS "fueKensu", Ta."choteiNendo", Ta."fukaNendo", Ta."choshuHouhou", Ta."dankai", SUM(Tb."dogetsusueChoteigaku") AS "fueChoteigakuCount" FROM (SELECT A."hihokenshaNo", A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."choshuHouhou", A."dankai", A."zengetsusueChoteigaku" FROM "TmpDankai" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} ) AS Ta, (SELECT A."hihokenshaNo", A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."choshuHouhou", A."dankai", A."dogetsusueChoteigaku" FROM "TmpDankai" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} ) AS Tb WHERE Ta."hihokenshaNo" = Tb."hihokenshaNo" AND Ta."choteiNendo" = Tb."choteiNendo" AND Ta."fukaNendo" = Tb."fukaNendo" AND Ta."choshuHouhou" = Tb."choshuHouhou" AND Ta."dankai" = Tb."dankai" AND Ta."zengetsusueChoteigaku" < Tb."dogetsusueChoteigaku" GROUP BY Ta."choteiNendo", Ta."fukaNendo", Ta."choshuHouhou", Ta."dankai"

SELECT COUNT(Ta."hihokenshaNo") AS "genKensu", Ta."choteiNendo", Ta."fukaNendo", Ta."choshuHouhou", Ta."dankai", SUM(Ta."zengetsusueChoteigaku") AS "genChoteigakuCount" FROM (SELECT A."hihokenshaNo", A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."choshuHouhou", A."dankai", A."zengetsusueChoteigaku" FROM "TmpDankai" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} ) AS Ta, (SELECT A."hihokenshaNo", A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."choshuHouhou", A."dankai", A."dogetsusueChoteigaku" FROM "TmpDankai" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} ) AS Tb WHERE Ta."hihokenshaNo" = Tb."hihokenshaNo" AND Ta."choteiNendo" = Tb."choteiNendo" AND Ta."fukaNendo" = Tb."fukaNendo" AND Ta."choshuHouhou" = Tb."choshuHouhou" AND Ta."dankai" = Tb."dankai" AND Ta."zengetsusueChoteigaku" > Tb."dogetsusueChoteigaku" GROUP BY Ta."choteiNendo", Ta."fukaNendo", Ta."choshuHouhou", Ta."dankai"
SELECT "TmpKibetsu".* FROM "TmpKibetsu" WHERE "choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND "fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo}
SELECT "TmpDankai".* FROM "TmpDankai" WHERE "choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND "fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo}
SELECT "TmpDankaiShokei".* FROM "TmpDankaiShokei" WHERE "choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND "fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo}
SELECT "TmpKibetsuShokei".* FROM "TmpKibetsuShokei" WHERE "choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND "fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo}

select.id: select段階合計From段階小計一時テーブル

mapper.select: SELECT A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."choshuHouhou", SUM(A."fueKensu") AS "fueZennbuKennsuuGokei", SUM(A."fueChoteigakuCount") AS "fueZennbuChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."genKensu") AS "genZennbuKennsuuGokei", SUM(A."genChoteigakuCount") AS "genZennbuChoteigakuGokei" FROM "TmpDankaiShokei" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} AND A."dogetsuFlag" = 1 GROUP BY A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."choshuHouhou"

SELECT A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", COUNT(DISTINCT A."tsuchishoNo") AS "genmenCount", SUM(A."gemmenGaku") AS "genmenChoteigaku" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} AND (#{chushutsuStYMD} <= A."choteiNichiji" AND A."choteiNichiji" < #{chushutsuEdYMD} ) GROUP BY A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo"

SELECT A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", COUNT(A."tkSaishutsuKampuGaku") AS "tkSaishutsuKampuCount", SUM(A."tkSaishutsuKampuGaku") AS "tkSaishutsuKampuChoteiGaku" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} AND A."choteiNichiji" < #{chushutsuEdYMD} AND A."tkSaishutsuKampuGaku" <> 0 GROUP BY A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo"

SELECT A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", COUNT(A."fuSaishutsuKampuGaku") AS "fuSaishutsuKampuCount", SUM(A."fuSaishutsuKampuGaku") AS "fuSaishutsuKampuChoteiGaku" FROM rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} AND A."choteiNichiji" < #{chushutsuEdYMD} AND A."fuSaishutsuKampuGaku" <> 0 GROUP BY A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo"

SELECT A."choteiNendo", A."choshuHouhou", SUM(A."dai1kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai1kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai2kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai2kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai3kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai3kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai4kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai4kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai5kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai5kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai6kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai6kiChoteigakuGokei" FROM "TmpKibetsuShokei" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND ( A."fukaNendo" = #{danNendo} OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenNendo}) OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenzenNendo}) ) AND A."choshuHouhou" = #{choshuHouhou} GROUP BY A."choteiNendo", A."choshuHouhou"

SELECT A."choteiNendo", A."choshuHouhou", SUM(A."dai1kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai1kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai2kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai2kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai3kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai3kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai4kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai4kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai5kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai5kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai6kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai6kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai7kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai7kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai8kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai8kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai9kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai9kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai10kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai10kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai11kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai11kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai12kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai12kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai13kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai13kiChoteigakuGokei", SUM(A."dai14kiChoteigakuCount") AS "dai14kiChoteigakuGokei" FROM "TmpKibetsuShokei" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND ((A."fukaNendo" = #{zenNendo}) OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenzenNendo}) ) AND A."choshuHouhou" = #{choshuHouhou} GROUP BY A."choteiNendo", A."choshuHouhou"

select.id: select当月末の段階のデータ

mapper.select: SELECT A."choshuHouhou", A."dankai", A."dogetsuFlag", SUM(A."dogetsusueKensu") AS "dogetsusueKensuCount", SUM(A."dogetsusueChoteigakuCount") AS "dogetsusueChoteigakuCount", SUM(A."fueKensu") AS "fueKensuCount", SUM(A."fueChoteigakuCount") AS "fueChoteigakuCount", SUM(A."genKensu") AS "genKensuCount", SUM(A."genChoteigakuCount") AS "genChoteigakuCount" FROM "TmpDankaiShokei" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND ( A."fukaNendo" = #{danNendo} OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenNendo}) OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenzenNendo}) ) AND A."dogetsuFlag" = #{dogetsuFlag} GROUP BY A."choshuHouhou", A."dankai", A."dogetsuFlag"

update.id: update当月末の段階のデータ

select.id: select前月末の段階のデータ

mapper.select: SELECT A."choshuHouhou", A."dankai", A."dogetsuFlag", SUM(A."zengetsusueKensu") AS "zengetsusueKensuCount", SUM(A."zengetsusueChoteigakuCount") AS "zengetsusueChoteigakuCount" FROM "TmpDankaiShokei" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND ( A."fukaNendo" = #{danNendo} OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenNendo}) OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenzenNendo}) ) AND A."dogetsuFlag" = #{dogetsuFlag} GROUP BY A."choshuHouhou", A."dankai", A."dogetsuFlag"

update.id: update前月末の段階のデータ

select.id: select段階の特徴と普徴者数

mapper.select: SELECT A."choshuHouhou", A."dankai", SUM(A."tokuchosyaKensu") AS "tokuchosyaKensuCount", SUM(A."fuchosyaKensu") AS "fuchosyaKensuCount", SUM(A."naiheisyaKensu") AS "naiheisyaKensuCount" FROM "TmpDankaiShokei" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND (A."fukaNendo" = #{danNendo} OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenNendo}) OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenzenNendo}) ) GROUP BY A."choshuHouhou", A."dankai"

update.id: update段階の特徴と普徴者数

mapper.select: SELECT A."choteiNendo", A."choshuHouhou", SUM(A."tobetsuChoteigakuCount") AS "tobetsuChoteigakuSoukei", SUM(A."futsuChoteigakuCount") AS "futsuChoteigakuSoukei", SUM(A."tobetsuTofutsuChoteigakuCount") AS "tobetsuTofutsuChoteigakuSoukei", SUM(A."genmenCount") AS "genmenSoukei", SUM(A."genmenChoteigaku") AS "genmenChoteigakuSoukei", SUM(A."tkSaishutsuKampuCount") AS "tkSaishutsuKampuSoukei", SUM(A."tkSaishutsuKampuChoteigaku") AS "tkSaishutsuKampuChoteigakuSoukei", SUM(A."fuSaishutsuKampuCount") AS "fuSaishutsuKampuSoukei", SUM(A."fuSaishutsuKampuChoteigaku") AS "fuSaishutsuKampuChoteigakuSoukei" FROM "TmpKibetsuGokei" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND (A."fukaNendo" = #{danNendo} OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenNendo}) OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenzenNendo}) ) GROUP BY A."choteiNendo", A."choshuHouhou"

SELECT A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."choshuHouhou", A."dogetsuFlag", SUM(A."zengetsusueKensuCount") AS "zengetsusueKensuSoukei", SUM(A."zengetsusueChoteigakuCount") AS "zengetsusueChoteigakuSoukei", SUM(A."fueZennbuKennsuuGokei") AS "fueZennbuKennsuuSoukei", SUM(A."fueZennbuChoteigakuGokei") AS "fueZennbuChoteigakuSoukei", SUM(A."genZennbuKennsuuGokei") AS "genZennbuKennsuuSoukei", SUM(A."genZennbuChoteigakuGokei") AS "genZennbuChoteigakuSoukei", SUM(A."dogetsusueKensuCount") AS "dogetsusueKensuSoukei", SUM(A."dogetsusueChoteigakuCount") AS "dogetsusueChoteigakuSoukei", SUM(A."tokuchosyaKensuCount") AS "tokuchosyaKensuSoukei", SUM(A."fuchosyaKensuCount") AS "fuchosyaKensuSoukei", SUM(A."naiheisyaKensuCount") AS "naiheisyaKensuSoukei" FROM "TmpDankaiGokei" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND (A."fukaNendo" = #{danNendo} OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenNendo}) OR (A."fukaNendo" = #{zenzenNendo}) ) GROUP BY A."choteiNendo", A."fukaNendo", A."choshuHouhou", A."dogetsuFlag"
SELECT A.* FROM "TmpKibetsuGokei" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo}
SELECT A.* FROM "TmpDankaiGokei" AS A WHERE A."choteiNendo" = #{choteiNendo} AND A."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo}
SELECT "TmpGokeiBubun".* FROM "TmpGokeiBubun"
SELECT "TmpGokeiBubunSoukei".* FROM "TmpGokeiBubunSoukei"
